title: ISic000487. I.Sicily inscription 000487
body:
Facsimile Images

1EHICPE
2[---]
3CLEMENTINE
4SORORI
5FLMAINI
6SENATORISIN
7VIXITAIII

Apparatus criticus

text of CIL

Italian translation

[...] All'infelice Clementina, sorella del senatore Flavio Maino, visse tre anni

English translation

[...] To the unfortunate Clementina, sister of the senator Flavius Mainus, lived three years

commentary

Gualterus reads F HIC P F [...] CLEMENTINAE [...] SORORI [...] FLAMINI SENATORIS IN [...] VIXIT · A · III

bibliography

  • 10.7207 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
